raw_response:
SUMMARY:  
This individual shows a strong preference for high-quality hair products, particularly human hair items, often used for styling, training, or personal use. Consistently high ratings of 4.5 and 5.0 for mannequin heads suggest satisfaction with products intended for hairdressing practice and aesthetic appeal, reflecting a commitment to quality and functionality. The sentiment around products is predominantly positive when they meet performance expectations. 

Conversely, there is a noticeable decline in sentiment toward the eyebrow stamp kit, rated poorly due to its ineffectiveness, indicating a critical approach to products that do not deliver on claims. 

Common themes include an emphasis on practicality in hair-related items for styling or practice, with a price sensitivity evident in the review of a hair bundle where the individual expressed that it was satisfactory for its price. Overall, this customer prioritizes quality, reliable performance, and value, displaying a keen interest in hair care and styling tools while demonstrating a discerning attitude toward less effective products.

target_interaction.title: Doesn’t work
target_interaction.text: Waste of money! It doesn’t work
target_interaction.title_meta: Eyebrow Stamp Stencil Kit Eyebrow Stamp Shaping Kit Waterproof Eyebrow tamp Hairline Shadow Powder (Natural Brown B)
features: [No Smudge, Waterproof Eyebrow Stamp]Our Eyebrow Stamp Stencil Kit is specially formulated to be waterproof and sweatproof. A bit of rain or sweat won’t ruin your eyebrows any longer. Ensures your eyebrows will look great even after a busy day in the office, with no smudging, no fading, our Eyebrow Stamp strong adhesion makes your makeup more durable. When you are ready to take them off, simply wipe them clean with your favorite make-up remover. Easy!

[Effortless Application]Eyebrow Stamp Stencil Kit Soft mushroom head design, waterproof and sweatproof, naturally does not fall off, just a few seconds to draw a natural and perfect eyebrow makeup, novices can easily use and making it easier than ever to design and decorate your eyebrows.

[10 Styles Eyebrow Stencils & Multi-Functions]Eyebrow Stamp Stencil Kit with 10 Styles Eyebrow Stencil and 2 Eyebrow Pen Brushes, the brow stamp is not only the product for perfect eyebrow but also can be used as shadow powder to contour your face and supplement your hairline, making your makeup more dedicated.

[Cruelty-Free Beauty] Eyebrow Stamp Stencil Kit Use the professional air cushion stamp with this vegan formula to apply the perfect amount of brow color and definition at the intensity you want. Never tested on animals.

[Risk-Free Purchase]Your satisfaction is our highest pursuit! When you buy and use the Eyebrow Stamp if you are not happy with the product, we offer you a free replacement or a full refund. Be sure to contact us first if you have any questions or suggestions!
